title.narrative: Integration Of Long-Term Idps Into The Host Community In Bosasso

description.narrative: The project purpose is to improve the living conditions of 500 long-term IDP families in six urban IDP settlements in Bosasso, and facilitate their integration into the host community with improved housing, water, sanitation and enhanced livelihood opportunities.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Security of land tenure for the residents of the selected settlements is provided and threat of forced eviction is permanently reduced

description.narrative: Security of land tenure for the residents of the selected settlements is provided and threat of forced eviction is permanently reduced

title.narrative: Residents receive a title deed from the land department of the Municipality, assuring gender-equitable access and property rights

description.narrative: Residents receive a title deed from the land department of the Municipality, assuring gender-equitable access and property rights

comment.narrative: Households have protection in their living environment by assuring land tenure
Households have protection in their living environment by assuring land tenure

title.narrative: Social-economic integration of the new community is improved and access to employment and livelihood opportunities is increased

description.narrative: Social-economic integration of the new community is improved and access to employment and livelihood opportunities is increased

title.narrative: IDPs and Host community members integrated in neighbourhoods on permanent basis. Number of IDPs employed after the project’s implementation

description.narrative: IDPs and Host community members integrated in neighbourhoods on permanent basis. Number of IDPs employed after the project’s implementation

comment.narrative: persons trained, find work after project completion
persons trained, find work after project completion

title.narrative: Upgrading of selected settlements and living conditions of up to 500 families (resettled from the settlers with land already in their possession) are improved.

description.narrative: Upgrading of selected settlements and living conditions of up to 500 families (resettled from the settlers with land already in their possession) are improved.

title.narrative: Access to water, sanitation and shelter: each household receives a private washroom, toilet, and shelter

description.narrative: Access to water, sanitation and shelter: each household receives a private washroom, toilet, and shelter

comment.narrative: Households receive upgraded /durable shelter, bathroom toilet, and perimeter wall after project completion
Households receive upgraded /durable shelter, bathroom toilet, and perimeter wall after project completion
